    • Constructor Detail

      • Rook

        public Rook​(int pos1,
            int pos2,
            String color)
        the constructor creates a new rook object and needs a x and a y axis position plus a color
        Parameters:
        pos1 - x axis position of the rook
        pos2 - y axis position of the rook
        color - color of the rook, valid input: "w" for white, "b" for black

                         int x,
                         int y)
        Checks if the current move is valid
        Overrides:
        validMove in class Figures

      • validMove1

        public boolean validMove1​(Board board,
                          int x,
                          int y)
        method to check if move is on the horizental line
        Parameters:
        board - the board on which the move is tested on
        x - the x axis position to move to
        y - the y axis position to move to
        Returns:
        true if move is valid, false if not or goes on to validMove2

      • validMove2

        public boolean validMove2​(Board board,
                          int x,
                          int y)
        method to check if move is on the vertical line
        Parameters:
        board - the board on which the move is tested on
        x - the x axis position to move to
        y - the y axis position to move to
        Returns:
        true if move is valid, else false
